about_the_game:
Lore is a first-person stealth horror puzzle game about escaping a mysterious hunter and finding your grandfather, who has gone missing.



Play as Bethany Lewis, a teenage girl who returns to her grandfather's home years after they stopped talking, only to be knocked unconscious by a mysterious man waiting inside. When Bethany awakens, she finds her grandfather captured inside a strange underground bunker, and the mysterious man patrolling the forest. She vows to avoid the hunter and rescue her grandfather from inside the basement.



Explore Grandpa's property, a vast forest full of secrets and puzzles, all which lead to a mysterious bunker by the lake. But watch out, you are being hunted by a mysterious man who will do anything to keep you away from the bunker. The man is powered by an adaptive AI which will change his behavior based on previous attempts, and set up different kinds of traps, forcing you to change your strategies and find new routes through the forest.



  • Suspenseful horror gameplay as you navigate the forest
  • Solve puzzles as you open up more areas of Grandpa's cottage
  • Hide in bushes or in lockers to avoid the mysterious man hunting you down
